titles: Faire and fowle vveather: or a sea and land storme betweene two calmes. With an apologie in defense of the painefull life, and needfull vse of sailors. By Iohn Tailor.
author: Taylor, John, 1580-1653.
publisher: Printed [by R. Blower] for W: B[utter?] and are to be solde by Edward Wright at Christ-Church gate,
notes: Printer's and publisher's names from STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
keywords: Sailors --  Social conditions --  Poetry --  Early works to 1800.
